Many of these deals are also now live at Best Buy (as per usual) and we are getting another chance at the new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 courtesy of Woot down at $59.99 Prime shipped (it’s a touch more pricey over at Best Buy right now, and this is the proper boxed U.S. version from Woot). You can scope out the new Nintendo Hits for the Holidays Sale right here, but you’ll find all of the best deals waiting below. 

Switch 2 + Mario Kart World Bundle $50 off w/ holiday delivery, Switch game deals, more
